duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage one or more handscoring contracts, participate in scheduling, resource planning, and develop item-specific training.
Utilize science expertise to guide item development, scoring, and client meetings. Manage math assessments as needed.
Communicate with various roles through chat, email, phone, reports, videoconference meetings, and in-person/virtual interactions.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers. Provide live or pre-recorded training on Science and Math items.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science or Physical Sciences (Master's preferred). Additional Math college courses are preferred.
